message: Let's be realistic, Bob. I'll give you a dollar, but I'm taking the rest.
Let's split it 50/50, a fair and reasonable offer!
I'm willing to be a little more generous this time, Bob.  But I still want the majority.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more for my efforts!
I'm getting impatient, Bob.  Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to let you take everything, Alice. This is a more reasonable offer!
This is my final offer, Bob.  If you reject it, we both get nothing.  Think about it.
I'm not going to give up, Alice. This is my last chance to make a good deal.
Time is running out, Bob. I'm not going to budge much further.
I'm not going to let you walk away with almost all the money, Alice. This is my final offer!
Bob, we are down to the wire. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to let it come to this, Alice. I'm making a fair offer. Take it!
